name: Burrow Blitz
description:
Help this greedy groundhog dig as deep as possible!

Collect minerals to prevent losing energy.
If the minerals match up... you can collect all at once! 

Moving and mining dirt cost energy. 

Mining rocks cost 2x energy!

Watch out for those rocks, they will crush you!
Also watch out for bombs, they explode! 

----------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:
ASDW, Arrow Keys or Controller

----------------------------------------------------

Art, Sound and Music by FERBY
Programming by QUEASY
